DTS:LogProvider.DTS:Description: Writes log entries for events to a SQL Server database
DTS:LogProvider.DTS:ObjectName: SSIS log provider for SQL Server

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
/* Copia la tabla HOST03.HOST03.DESARROLLO.CUP001R a una temporal para modificarle el formato de texto */ SELECT RUI_COD as id_rubro_ind_consumo, 'S/D' as de_rubro_ind_consumo INTO TMP_RUBROS_IND_CONSUMOS FROM HOST03.HOST03.DESARROLLO.CUP001R GROUP BY RUI_COD go
ALTER TABLE TMP_RUBROS_IND_CONSUMOS ALTER COLUMN id_rubro_ind_consumo varchar(50) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP850_CI_AI NULL go
INSERT INTO D_RUBROS_IND_CONSUMOS (id_rubro_ind_consumo, de_rubro_ind_consumo) SELECT id_rubro_ind_consumo, 'S/D' as de_rubro_ind_consumo FROM TMP_RUBROS_IND_CONSUMOS WHERE id_rubro_ind_consumo not in (select id_rubro_ind_consumo from D_RUBROS_IND_CONSUMOS) GROUP BY id_rubro_ind_consumo
DROP TABLE TMP_RUBROS_IND_CONSUMOS
